text: Viktor Vasnetsov (15 May 1848 - 23 July 1926) was a Russian artist. Themes of his paintings are dedicated to Slavic myths and fairy tales or legends. ==Portrait of Ivan The Terrible== In 1897, Vasnetsov painted a posthumous portrait of Ivan the Terrible. ==The Flying Carpet== In 1880, Vasnetsov painted "The Flying Carpet" with Russian Folklore Ivan Tsarevish Riding it. Category:Russian artists Category:1848 births Category:1926 deaths
title: Viktor Vasnetsov
